code: import{IonCard,IonCardContent}from'@ionic/react';import React from'react';import{useResource}from'rest-hooks';import FileResource from'../../resources/file';var PostCard=function PostCard(_ref){var post=_ref.post;var headerImage=useResource(FileResource.detailShape(),{id:post.header_image});var thumbnail=headerImage&&headerImage.data.thumbnails.find(function(thumb){return thumb.width===300&&thumb.url.includes('crop');});return React.createElement(IonCard,{className:"post-card",routerLink:"/posts/".concat(post.id)},thumbnail&&React.createElement("img",{src:thumbnail.url,alt:"thumbnail for post titled ".concat(post.title)}),React.createElement(IonCardContent,null,post.title));};export default PostCard;
